data.title: Mercury Online
data.meta_description: FTD's e-commerce website, Mercury Online, is designed for florists and powered by Shopify, the leading online platform in the market today.
data.text:
Control your Business from Anywhere

Integrates with Mercury HQ giving you the freedom to manage web, local and wire orders on a single, intuitive platform.

Boost Revenue

Order values average $105, and the average conversion rate is higher than the industry average ranging from 7-12% (the more engaged you are, the better the rate!).

Mobile-friendly, Easy to Shop

Capture shoppers on their mobile devices for a seamless shopping experience.

No Hidden Costs

With no fixed monthly costs, you only pay when you get an order.

Tailor your Success

Customize your site with local products, set pricing and add-ons to maximize your profitability.

View the FTD Flower Shop Demo site.

Features Just for Florists

Mercury Online includes additional features designed specifically to boost your online floral business, such as:
